name: Arcade Hooper
description:
Play your Favorite Arcade Basketball with the ability to use Powerups and Conquer the Leaderboards with your shooting skills!

GAME FEATURES:

♦ Simple swipe up shooting control
♦ 10 Rounds of Non-stop Shooting action
♦ 4 Usable Powerups
♦ Real Physics Simulated Shooting Game
♦ Detailed Shooting Scores and Accuracy
♦ Leaderboard Ranking Competition
♦ Login your Google Play to Save your Tickets and Stats

Show the World What You're Capable Of!
Be the Best Hooper Master!
Good Luck!
